resources:
Quissteling com.bijgepast.quissteling_setting Enter a username The Quissteling Log in MainActivity Home Dashboard Notifications score bord My prizes <- code I Score Ranking Username Close Put the question code in: Enter "The Quissteling app gives a digital experience by means of a quiz. In order to play the quiz first a minigame must be played. On the map you will find where minigames are found. After finishing a minigame successfully you will receive a code. When you press the button in the top right of the app you will be able to put this code in and start with answering quiz questions. \\n \\n When you have answered a question correctly you will receive a score for this. Your total score is viewable in the top of the navigation bar. If you want to know how your score compares in comparison to other Quissteling users, then you can press on the top-left button to go to the leaderboard. In the leaderboard you can also find any prizes you may have won. Prizes are awarded at the end of the day according to the leaderboard positions. In addition to that, there is also a small chance to win a price after correctly answering any quiz question. " Close You got the question right! Your new score is: Unfortunately you got the question wrong! Your score stays: Prize Description Placement needed Ok fastlaneticket You have won a price Essteling Red Riding Hood keychain A keychain of Red Riding Hood. Essteling Red Riding Hood stuffed animal. A stuffed animal looking like Red Riding Hood. Essteling ticket discount voucher. A one use discount voucher for a ticket from the Essteling. Essteling Restaurant discount voucher. A one use discount voucher that can be used at our restaurants. Essteling fastlane pass A pass that can be used once to surpass the waiting que. Username is empty
//questions Red Riding Hood
Which haircolor does Red Riding Hood have? Blond Black Brown Red
The statue of Red Riding Hood has once been stolen, in which year did this happen for the first time?
Which animal makes his appearance in the story of Red Riding Hood? Lion Fox Kangaroo Wolf
Which family member makes an appearance in the story of Red Riding Hood? Her grandpa Her grandma Her father Her sister
What is Red Riding Hood called in Dutch? Rood Rijdend kapje Meisje in het rood Roodkapje Rood hoedje
Since which year is Red Riding Hood part of the Essteling?
The length of the code is not correct You\'ve used this location recently This is not the right code
